title: Maane Maane Lyrics Uriyadi
stanzas:
Uriyadi Maane Maane Song Lyrics
Singer : Anthony Daasan
Music : Anthony Daasan, Masala Coffee
Lyrics : Anthony Daasan

Sokkavacha pacha kili
suthu vuttu paaththadhennna
mutham onnu kaetadhukku
vetkapattu ponadhenna (2)

adi maane maane
unna uravena nenachene
unnathaane naane
en usurukkul olichene

Sokkavacha pacha kili
suthu vuttu paaththadhennna
mutham onnu kaetadhukku
vetkapattu ponadhenna (2)

sengarummbu chaareduthu
naanum senja vellakatti
engae vacha emmanasa
sollendi en chellakutty

kandaenadi adi kadhaliye
unmugatha naethuthaan.
kondaen aasai poongodiye
unkooda naan serathaan.

penne en manasu therinjum
puriyadhadhu pol
nadikkaadhe
pechu paara rendulayum
erimalaiyaa vedikadhe

adi maane maane
unna uravena nenachene
unnathaane naane
en usurukkul olichene

Sokkavacha pacha kili
suthu vuttu paaththadhennna
mutham onnu kaetadhukku
vetkapattu ponadhenna (2)

konja kaalam boomiyila
naam porundhom vazhathaan.
indha jenmam podhadhadi
unna naanum aalathaan. (2)

chellamani nee irundhal
en vahkayum sola thaan
pulla kutti pethu vazhum
aalam vizhudha polathaan.

kanne enna vittu neeyum
odhungi poga nenaikkadhe
kadhaliye kadhalicha
enna neeyum marakkadhe..

adi maane maane
unna uravena nenachene
unnathaane naane
en usurukkul olichene

Sokkavacha pacha kili
suthu vuttu paaththadhennna
mutham onnu kaetadhukku
vetkapattu ponadhenna (2)
